messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to murderbone hell hole 1. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we hired some entertainment for your long shift he should be at the bar soon enjoy he is quite talented in music

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Fore Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Emergency Storage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Congratulations Nanotrasen, you beat our final boss. Good work all of you, you're all honorary wizard acadamy graduates.
